snippet.title: Could a plane hide from radar detection?
snippet.description:
* As the mystery of the disappearance of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 continues, Becky made a visit to City University in London, to learn more about the technical mechanisms behind an aircraft. Inside an Airbus A320 flight simulator, she spoke to David...
http://connecttheworld.blogs.cnn.com/2014/03/18/could-a-plane-hide-from-radar-detection/

snippet.title: MH 370 pilot: Home flight simulator seized in hope of clues
snippet.description:
* Like an over-keen online gamer, there appears nothing in Captain Zaharie Ahmad Shah's post on a flight simulator forum that suggests anything more untoward than exaggerated geekiness.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/18/world/asia/mh370-pilot-flight-simulator/index.html

snippet.title: Meet the pilots behind the sun-powered plane that can 'fly forever'
snippet.description:
* Their CVs combined look like the envy of all bona fide air adventurers. Pioneering ultralight aircraft? Been there. Setting world records by circling the globe nonstop in a balloon? Done that. Commanding the first ever 24-hour flight on a plane powered just by the sun? Yep, you've guessed it.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/15/tech/a-plane-that-flies-forever-solar-impulse/index.html

snippet.title: Malaysia Airlines Flight 370: Australia says possible objects in Indian Ocean
snippet.description:
* Authorities have spotted two objects in the Indian Ocean that are possibly related to the search for missing Malaysia Airlines Flight 370, Australian Prime Minister Tony Abbott said Thursday.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/19/world/asia/malaysia-airlines-plane/index.html

snippet.title: The mystery of Malaysia Air 370
snippet.description:
* Today on CNN’s Reliable Sources hosted by Brian Stelter, aviation journalist, Robert Hager, spoke with Stelter about what he thinks about the missing Malaysian Air Flight 370. Frank Sesno, director of the George Washington University School of Media...
http://cnnpressroom.blogs.cnn.com/2014/03/16/the-mystery-of-malaysia-air-370/

snippet.title: Report: MH370 disappearance a criminal investigation, police chief says
snippet.description:
* The investigation into Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 is now classified as a criminal investigation, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing the Malaysian police chief.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/01/world/asia/malaysia-airlines-plane/index.html

snippet.title: Flight 370: Investigators still guessing as underwater search begins
snippet.description:
* The underwater hunt for wreckage of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 has started in the southern Indian Ocean, the Australian agency coordinating search efforts said Friday.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/03/world/asia/malaysia-airlines-plane/index.html

snippet.title: Flight 370 search: 'It could take months, it could take years'
snippet.description:
* Many have pointed to lessons learned -- and heeded -- from the disappearance of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370\.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/02/world/asia/malaysia-airlines-plane/index.html
